name: Swift Client
desc: Swift Minecraft Client is a Minecraft modification designed to gain an advantage against other players and as a tool to help you win your games and matches with undetectable bypasses and polished QoL features

name: Swift HLL
desc: Swift HLL is the name for a Hell Let Loose (HLL) modification to assist you in competitive games, using our proprietary kernel driver to remain 100% undetected

name: Swift Injectable
desc: For lack of a better name, this is an injectable CS2 modification, to help you win your games and matches while going fully undetected, using our exclusive methods of hijacking the game's functionality

name: Crystal
desc: An interpreted programming language, parsed and written in C#

name: Swift Auth
desc: A full-stack solution for authentication, basic username/email & password login and persistent login status

name: Swift Driver
desc: A proprietary kernel-driver. Used for memory operations (ex: Reading & Writing memory)

name: Swift Upload
